⚽ @k_aando 

The ball falls invitingly for debutant Anderson, who drills home!

#pafc 3 #cafc 2 https://t.co/AietDou1V2

90+2' 🎯 GOAL! On debut!!!

#pafc 3 #cafc 2 https://t.co/acAtYSUJpR

90+1' 3️⃣ added minutes... 
 
#pafc 3 #cafc 1

90' 😬 Close from Chin...

The full-back curls just wide of Burton's left upright. 
 
#pafc 3 #cafc 1

83' 😬 Big chance for Argyle...

Roberts gets played through on goal but he drags his effort wide.
 
#pafc 3 #cafc 1

75' 🔄 A debut for Karoy Anderson 👏

🔛 Anderson
↩️ Henry
  
#pafc 3 #cafc 1

75' ⏸️ Break in play here as Elerewe receives treatment...

The centre-back fell awkwardly after going in for a header at the far post.  
  
#pafc 3 #cafc 1

71'  ✈️ Henry lets fly...

The midfielder picks up a loose ball on the halfway line and tries his luck, but his effort goes just over.
  
#pafc 3 #cafc 1

46' Goal Argyle.

Roberts adds the hosts' third.
 
#pafc 3 #cafc 1

⏯️ 46' 🔙 under way in Devon...

🔄 One change...

🔛 Rylah
↩️ Forster-Caskey

🔴⚪️ #cafc

⏸️ Behind at the break.

🔴⚪️ #cafc

45+2' 😲 Big chance for Ennis...

The striker somehow heads over from close range. 
 
#pafc 2 #cafc 1

45+1' 2️⃣ added minutes... 
 
#pafc 2 #cafc 1

39' 💪 Strong play from Campbell...

The winger wins the ball down the left and crosses for Payne, who steers just wide.
 
#pafc 2 #cafc 1

36' 🤏 Kanu goes close...

The forward steals possession from Halls but Burton is out quickly to smother the ball.

#pafc 2 #cafc 1

28' 💪 Big block from Mitchell...

The defender bravely denies Cosgrove. 

#pafc 2 #cafc 1

20' 😬 Close from Campbell!

The winger forces Burton into a smart stop and the rebound just evades Payne.

#pafc 2 #cafc 1

17' 🧤 Harness is forced into action...

The stopper palms away Roberts' drive. 

#pafc 2 #cafc 1

15' Goal Argyle.

Ennis capitalises on a defensive mix-up to fire the hosts ahead.

#pafc 2 #cafc 1

13' Goal Argyle.

Cosgrove draws the hosts level, latching onto Ennis' through ball and drilling past Harness.

#pafc 1 #cafc 1

11' 🟨 Booking for Henry.

The midfielder mistimes his challenge on Miller.

#pafc 0 #cafc 1

⚽ @danielkanu_ 

💪 Kanu steals possession from Halls in the final third and although Burton saves his initial effort, the striker is on hand to bury the rebound! 

#pafc 0 #cafc 1 https://t.co/tareppKmn5

8' 🎯 GOAL! KANUUUUU!!

#pafc 0 #cafc 1 https://t.co/64U6ZBkNAh

7' 🎯 Campbell takes aim.

The winger takes the ball past Craske before shooting over on the angle.

#pafc 0 #cafc 0

UTA! 🗡️

72' 🟨  Booking for Inniss.

He's cautioned for a foul on Garrity. 

#pvfc 1 #cafc 0

71' 🎯 Butterfield takes aim. 

Vale's goalscorer rifles over.

#pvfc 1 #cafc 0

64' 💥 Aneke hits one.  

Chuks swivels and shoots but his effort goes over.

#pvfc 1 #cafc 0

58' 🔄 Our first change...

🔛 Aneke
↩️ Stockley

🙌 Come on, Chuks! 

#pvfc 1 #cafc 0

Butterworth finishes past Maynard-Brewer.

#pvfc 1 #cafc 0
